text: Good morning, we have a cool task this morning that could benefit more than 2 of us
morning; sure let me know of the task
Save the children is a non profit who could benefit from a donation
alright; i have heard of the organisation.
Each of us could use a monetary benefit
well, it would depend on the task
The organization depends on monetary donations to help provide safety to children.  In places like syria
how do i know this is reputable?  i normally only decide to donate unless i see legitimate documentation regarding it.
you can check out their website:  URL
alright; are you not able to acquire donations in another fashion?  i am concerned proceeds would not be going to the appropriate place
I like the idea that as little as 77 cents can provide positive gain for the organization
how many donations have you all receieved thus far?
My goal is to donate today and hope you will too
i dont feel comfortable donating unless i see more documentation
Interesting, did you scroll thru the webpage.
yup, but i may need to speak with an actual person, in person, to make further decisions
I like how they donate 90% of proceeds directly to the cause
sure; but i would need to do more research to see if proceeds to indeed go to where they are intended to go
How much do you want to donate to the charity today?
for today, it would be $0, for the reasons discussed.
